br.span: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced schools will be closed through May 1, 2020 due to Coronavirus concerns. Please find the latest Educational, Food Service, Board Office and Spring Break updates here.

div.a: Niles staff featured in the opening video for the Ohio Department of Education's Literacy Academy Conference 2020

span.div: Check out Niles administrators and teachers featured in the video below. This video was the opening video for the Ohio Department of Education's Literacy Academy Conference 2020. Thank you to Mr. Staph, Mrs. D'Urso, Mrs. Duncan and Mrs. Ward for their participation in the video and more importantly for representing our district.

span.a: Sign up here for emergency and school closing alerts. The Niles City School District will now utilize a new system in the event of an emergency or school closing. In order to receive alerts, you will need to create a new account. Emergency and school closing information will also be posted on the district's homepage. If you have any questions, Please contact us at (330) 989-5095.

div.br: To instruct a defined curriculum in a safe, educational environment. The district will ensure the opportunity for all students to become responsible learners, critical thinkers and problem solvers as productive members of a democratic society.
